welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Jalapa, Mexico! Get ready to experience the charm and beauty of this vibrant city, known for its rich culture, delicious cuisine, and breathtaking scenery. We invite you to fully immerse yourself in all that Jalapa has to offer and make unforgettable memories during your stay here."
